caption.title: Ecological niche models for every studied species.
caption.p: Geographic projections of inferred ecological niche models from the species studied for present and future RCP 2.6 and RCP 8.5 climate scenarios. (A–C) Berberis trifoliolata. (C–E) Ephedra aspera. (G–I) Leucophyllum laevigatum. (J–L) Lindleya mespiloides. (M–O) Setchellanthus caeruleus.
